catch_booster_medium.description: Boosts catch rate by 1.3x for 8 hours

catch_booster_large.name: Large Catch Rate Booster
catch_booster_large.description: Boosts catch rate by 1.5x for 12 hours

token_booster_small.description: Boosts token gain by 1.2x for 4 hours

token_booster_medium.name: Medium Token Booster
token_booster_medium.description: Boosts token gain by 1.2x for 10 hours

token_booster_large.name: Large Token Booster
token_booster_large.description: Boosts token gain by 1.5x for 12 hours

nickname_color_change.name: Nickname Color Change
nickname_color_change.description: Allows you to change the color of your nickname in bot embeds

team_slot_expansion.description: Adds an additional team slot for battle teams

party_size_expansion.description: Increases your maximum party size by 1 (up to 8)
